item.title: Toggle 1.9.2 – New update
item.description:
The version Toggle 1.9.2 is now available:

  • Changelog:
  • Made button UI more consistent across views
  • Added banner image generation and integrated banners into UI
  • Introduced new 2-tier Game Details view with HowLongToBeat (HLTB) integration
  • Fixed progress bar clipping issue
  • Updated default button focus behavior for better controller and keyboard navigation (thanks pinn73)
  • Various UI fixes and polish improvements
  • Fixed PSP banner bug (thanks TwoTracks)

By jonosellier

item.title: Phishing scam campaign warning
item.description:
Several users have recently reported receiving emails offering paid promotion for Playnite. This is a scam/phishing attempt, not a legitimate sponsorship offer.

Crow confirms that no sponsorship campaign is running, and no third party has been authorized to run one. Playnite has no PR staff, and nobody other than Crow is authorized to officially represent the project.

This also applies to any third-party distribution of Playnite itself: only download Playnite from the official website (playnite.link) or the official GitHub page (github.com/JosefNemec/Playnite).
